effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 751,192 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 295,287.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 89,983 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 8,794 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 1.7 million Fire damage to your primary target and 141,456 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.
